ChemicaLite
===========

[![Powered by RDKit](https://img.shields.io/badge/Powered%20by-RDKit-3838ff.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://www.rdkit.org/)


An SQLite database extension for chemoinformatics applications. Store molecules and fingerprints, compute descriptors, run chemical queries on a chemical database.
